lead_paragraph: Six iconic and very different buildings reveal a great deal about human life from the unblinking perspective of a manmade structure. Six acclaimed filmmakers bring their own signature style and artistic approach to the project. Buildings, they show us, are material manifestations of human thought and action. Here, we explore how each of these landmarks -- a concert hall, a library, a research institute, a prison, a cultural center and an opera house -- reflects our culture and guards our collective memory.
